Shyama Infosys Standalone September 2019 Net Sales at Rs 0.08 crore, up 66.67% Y-o-Y

06 Nov 2019


Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Shyama Infosys are:

Net Sales at Rs 0.08 crore in September 2019 up 66.67% from Rs. 0.05 crore in September 2018.
Quarterly Net Loss at Rs. 0.02 crore in September 2019 down 7850% from Rs. 0.00 crore in September 2018.

Close

EBITDA stands negative at Rs. 0.02 crore in September 2019 down 0% from Rs. 0.00 crore in September 2018.
Shyama Infosys shares closed at 1.30 on October 04, 2019 (BSE)
